Package sh.brane.core.abi

package sh.brane.core.abi
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    sh.brane.core
     
  • Class
    Description
    Abi
    Application Binary Interface (ABI) for encoding/decoding smart contract function calls and events.
    Abi.FunctionCall
     
    Abi.FunctionMetadata
     
    AbiBinding
    Binds Java interface methods to ABI function metadata for type-safe contract interactions.
    AbiDecoder
    Decodes byte arrays into ABI types according to the Ethereum Contract ABI specification.
    AbiEncoder
    Encodes ABI types into byte arrays according to the Ethereum Contract ABI specification.
    AbiType
    Represents a Solidity type that can be encoded/decoded.
    AddressType
    Represents a Solidity address type for ABI encoding/decoding.
    Array<T extends AbiType>
    Represents a Solidity array (static T[N] or dynamic T[]).
    Bool
    Represents a Solidity boolean (bool) type for ABI encoding/decoding.
    Bytes
    Represents a Solidity bytes type (bytes or bytesN).
    DynamicAbiType
    Represents variable-size ABI types that require offset-based indirection in encoding.
    FastAbiEncoder
    High-performance ABI encoder that eliminates intermediate object allocations.
    Int
    Represents a Solidity signed integer (int8 to int256).
    PackedSizeCalculator
    Calculates the exact byte size of encoded ABI types without performing the encoding.
    StaticAbiType
    Represents fixed-size ABI types that always occupy exactly 32 bytes in encoding.
    Tuple
    Represents a Solidity tuple (sequence of types).
    TypeSchema
    Defines the schema (expected type structure) for ABI decoding.
    TypeSchema.AddressSchema
     
    TypeSchema.ArraySchema
    Schema for Solidity array types (both fixed-size and dynamic).
    TypeSchema.BoolSchema
     
    TypeSchema.BytesSchema
    Schema for Solidity bytes or bytesN types.
    TypeSchema.IntSchema
     
    TypeSchema.StringSchema
     
    TypeSchema.TupleSchema
     
    TypeSchema.UIntSchema
     
    UInt
    Represents a Solidity unsigned integer (uint8 to uint256).
    Utf8String
    Represents a Solidity string (UTF-8 encoded).
